channel.title: Miltiplayer crashes and drop frames because of gibs?
channel.description: I played in multiplayer for hours and seems like everyone struggles with random crashes and fps drops. On bm_bounce map, where everything is visible I also got some warning on screen, "Overflow RenderSomething 7" right before it crashes. I have an idea, that this is because of gibs, thats stays forever or just too long. Is there a console command to change this timeout to prove my theory? And also, thank you for that nice game and awesome multiplayer :stuck_out_tongue: I'll attach my latest dumps, maybe it can help. dumps.zip (555 KB)

item.title: Miltiplayer crashes and drop frames because of gibs?
item.dc:creator: Maxi
item.description:
I got it again - it was “Overflow RenderablesList group 7” and game was really slow (FPS), before it crashes. Other player was disconnected too, before me (not simultaneously).
Usially it happens when players using lot of grenades and other weapons, that makes models explode.
This is seriuos, i don’t understand why nobody writes nothing about this, I’m crashed like 3 times in last 5 minutes and I see in chat that every couple minutes sombody disconnecting because of error, and reconnecting again.

Read full topic
item.source: Miltiplayer crashes and drop frames because of gibs?

item.title: Miltiplayer crashes and drop frames because of gibs?

item.description:
I played in multiplayer for hours and seems like everyone struggles with random crashes and fps drops. On bm_bounce map, where everything is visible I also got some warning on screen, “Overflow RenderSomething 7” right before it crashes. I have an idea, that this is because of gibs, thats stays forever or just too long. Is there a console command to change this timeout to prove my theory?
And also, thank you for that nice game and awesome multiplayer

I’ll attach my latest dumps, maybe it can help.
